targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(id)
FROM cowrie.downloads
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

SELECT
  count(distinct ip)
FROM cowrie.sessions
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(starttime)
select version from cowrie.clients;

SELECT
  count(id)
FROM cowrie.clients

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM cowrie.auth
select latitude, longitude from cowrie.coord;
select input, count(*) from cowrie.input group by input;

SELECT
  username,
  count(*) AS attempt_count
FROM cowrie.auth
GROUP BY username
ORDER BY attempt_count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  password,
  count(*) AS attempt_count
FROM cowrie.auth
GROUP BY password
ORDER BY attempt_count DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  id
FROM cowrie.auth
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp
select SO, count(*) as cantidad from laravel.sospechosos group by SO order by cantidad desc;
select motivo, count(*) from laravel.sospechosos group by motivo;

panels.title: Cantidas de cada Tipo de Ataque

targets.rawSql: select navegador, count(*) as cantidad from laravel.sospechosos group by navegador order by cantidad desc;
select url, count(*) from laravel.honeypot_urls_accessed group by url;

SELECT
  latitud AS lat,
  longitud AS lon,
  COUNT(*) AS value
FROM laravel.sospechosos
GROUP BY lat, lon;
select distinct src_port from opencanary.open_ftp;
select latitud, longitud from opencanary.map_ftp;
select distinct user_name from opencanary.open_ftp;
select distinct password from opencanary.open_ftp;
select src_ip, count(*) from opencanary.open_ftp GROUP BY src_ip;

SELECT 'IPs Reales' AS ip, COUNT(*) AS cantidad
FROM proveedor_ip.clean_ips

UNION

SELECT tipo, COUNT(*) AS cantidad
FROM proveedor_ip.ips
GROUP BY tipo;

SELECT proveedor, tipo, COUNT(*) AS cantidad
FROM proveedor_ip.ips
GROUP BY proveedor, tipo
ORDER BY cantidad DESC;

SELECT ip, ptr, COUNT(*) AS repeticiones
FROM ftp.attem
GROUP BY ip, ptr
ORDER BY repeticiones DESC;
